Project Description
SharePoint Of View - SPReporting is intended to be a reporting framework for SharePoint admins.

This project helps you build jobs to gather data from your farm and provide graphical reports (charting).

It's developed in C# with Visual Studio 2008 and uses Silverlight 2.0.

III. Installation

III.1. Pre requisites:
  • Server side :
    • .xap MIME type enabled on your Central Admin website (cf. http://blogs.msdn.com/tims/archive/2008/03/18/configuring-a-web-server-to-host-silverlight-content.aspx for more information)
    • SharePointOfView solution v1.1.0.0
    • optional .Net Framework 3.5 SP1
  • Client side :
    • Silverlight 2.0 RTM

III.2 Installation commands

First, if you haven't already installed the SharePointOfView 1.1.0.0 Framework, download it now (cf. pre requisites) and install it.

Then :
  • Run STSADM : stsadm.exe -o addsolution -filename SharePointOfView.SPReporting.wsp, then go to Central Administration > Operations > Solution Management and Deploy the solution or run the command stsadm.exe -o deploysolution -name SharePointOfView.SPReporting.wsp
  • Go to Central Administration > Operations > SharePoint Of View > Reports Center Administration and enter the target website's url that will host the Reports Center.

III.3 Optional:

You may install also the samples (SharePointOfView.SPReporting.Samples.wsp). They add a job and several report models to get started.
  • Run STSADM : stsadm.exe -o addsolution -filename SharePointOfView.SPReporting.Samples.wsp, then go to Central Administration > Operations > Solution Management and Deploy the solution or run the command stsadm.exe -o deploysolution -name SharePointOfView.SPReporting.Samples.wsp
  • Go to Central Administration > Operations > SharePoint Of View > Reports Center Administration and activate the Feature "SoV - SPReporting - Farm Structure Job"
